interpretation:
Opener has 13-21 points and 5+ spades.
Denies 1NT opening.

hints.hint0:
3 spades for support
Opener may have 5 hearts
Small=6-9, Medium=10-12, Large=12+
hints.hint1:
Two support bids that look for a singleton/void
2 over 1 suit must be lower than opening suit
hints.hint2:
Support
	0-5: Pass
	6-10: 2S
	0-9, single/void, 5+: 4S
	11-12: 3S (Major Limit Raise)
	13+, single/void, 4+: DJS (Splinter)
	13+: 2Minor (2 over 1)
No Support
	0-5:Pass
	10+, 4+H: 2H
	6-12: 1NT
	15-17, 2S, balanced: 3NT
	13+: 2 Minor (2 over 1)
	12+, 4S, balanced: 2NT (Jacoby 1NT)
